name: Social Distancing: The Game (anthonypieper)
description:
This is a game I made while self-isolating at home... Kind of meta, when you think about it!

A viral pandemic is sweeping the city. Sick people are out in droves, and the sicker they are, the slower they move. While most people are stuck at home, panic strikes! No toilet paper!!!

Now, a lone hero must venture out into the city to collect the available toilet paper and deliver it to those in need... Don't get sick, and don't let the time run out!

Good luck!

Controls:

  • Left and Right arrow keys move
  • Up arrow key jumps
  • Spacebar is the action key (transitioning rooms, handing out toilet paper, using hand sanitizer)
  • M toggles the map
  • Ctrl + A toggles music
  • Ctrl + S toggles sound effects
  • Ctrl + F toggles full screen
  • Ctrl + R restarts game

... there's also a hidden CHEAT key. Think you can figure out how to toggle it?

And there are rudimentary mouse controls, although I haven't added the ability to open the map with the mouse (yet).

To see some Behind-the-Scenes work of me making this game, check out my blog (which also contains links to my YouTube channel)!
